      public void editMap​(java.lang.String p_FileName)
      This method loads an existing file. If file is not found, it creates a file and map from scratch.
      Parameters:

    • validateMap

      public boolean validateMap​(Map p_Map)
      checking if the map is connected, all countries belong to at least one continent, all continents have at least one country, sub-graphs are connected which means the countries inside a continent are connected.
      Parameters:
      p_Map - Map object
      Returns:
      checking validity

      Depth-first-search (dfs)
      Parameters:
      p_CountryList - list of countries
      p_typeOfGraph - type of graph
      Returns:
      true if dfs was successful
